website_summaries.verdict: A top in-wall speaker by a trusted brand that has it all: style, sound, and user-friendly installation.
pros: In addition to excellent, full-bodied sound, it has a 7 millimeter cover that's the most streamlined in its class
Comes with a Perfect Fit template for straightforward installation
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum for a single speaker

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and sound of this center channel. Some reviewers complained about the grill holes and color, they look good to me- I didn't need to paint the cover as the color was good. I included some pics to show it better.
customer_reviews.author: 7smash

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Within Your Grasp
customer_reviews.text: Great center speaker for my living room surround sound. Speaker came as described and was the best price I could find anywhere. I view this Polk speaker as a great value for those of us on a budget. You can definitely buy cheaper speakers that do not perform as well. This speaker performs great and the tweeters can be manually directed towards the listening position, which comes in extremely handy when the speaker is mounted in the ceiling. I would recommend to anyone looking for a great sounding speaker especially home theater center speaker.
customer_reviews.author: BigTSpearTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Great center and easy to install - even if there's a stud in the way
customer_reviews.text: Very nice center at a great price. The install template is easy to use. Of course, you may run into a stud right where you want the speaker to be so there will be work on your end to make it fit. In my case, the stud was blocking the right locking lugs so I simply cut off the interfering part and made it work. Snugged it up and ran the wires through. Very easy. All done in about 45 min from box open to watching great P2P content.
customer_reviews.author: KissingTaco

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of this brand before but since the price fits my budget and it has a very good review on Amazon I took a chance and bought 4 of thePolk small, round in ceiling speakers and this center speaker. When the installer arrived he actually told me that he is glad that I bought the POLK brand because the speakers are really good and very reliable. He also recommended that I add a subwoofer so I also bought the Polk Audio PSW10 10-Inch Powered Subwoofer. After the installation, our theater room sounds really crisp and great! I feel like I am in the movie theater!
customer_reviews.author: LoveLea20

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 7.2 installnindid, this was the best speaker. Don't get a no name brand speaker for your center. This is where a lot of your primary sound is coming from. The duel speaker and directional tweeter are great. These drivers sound good. Little bit of bass along with my sub. It was my most expensive speaker and worth it. It has a 10-120 watt range at 8ohms. Great range for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knight

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. My wall is backed by the garage so errant sound isn’t a problem but an adjoining room would be loud. I have a sub but the bass sounds pretty good. Looks good without the grill. Pops off. Just uses magnets. Easy install if there are no studs... a bit harder if there are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound!
customer_reviews.text: I matched these with the Polk 265rt for fronts along with 65rt and 70rt for rear and ceiling speakers. These speakers exceeded my expectations of what an in wall speaker could sound like. The clarify is unbelievable! The grills are beautiful with thin frames that attach via magnet and the mesh is very fine for a high-end look.
customer_reviews.author: SeeJ333

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers...they have great sound. Pay attention on installation though and plan it out. This guy will fit PERFECTLY between 18" studs, if you cut the hole just right. If you cut it too close to the stud though, the anchor piece cannot catch the drywall. Also, DO NOT overtighten!!! I broke the drywall on 1 bolt on three speakers, it is still stable but the drywall is visible bulged out. Take my advice, and some others and get some insulation or some type of filling for the wall. It sounds good in my living room, but you can also hear it very, very clear from my bathroom (other side of the wall) just as well! haha
customer_reviews.author: Nathan O.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and set up
customer_reviews.text: super easy install, hardest part was determining a spot to avoid studs in wall. i could not center it because of a stud in wall, offset it and it blends in so not a big issue. Sound - i replaced a center channel that was in my ceiling, which caused muffled voices. This really improved the sound quality. i am not a sound geek, just wanted solid sound when watching movies and TV. i am sure any speaker would have improved the sound but this was a good price, sounds good and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice speakers! I was very impressed, to the point I bought two more sets to complete home theater project. Very, very happy with product/price/ and packaging....fit perfect with 16 inch on center studs. Very nice appearance and craftmanship....still can't get over the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin B.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: very good sounding speaker I would buy again in a instant my setup is a Marantz 6012 in a 5.1.4 setup I run the 265 rt speakers on all 4 corners then I use the 80 r/x rt for my atmos in ceiling and a svs pb 2000 sub and the 255c rt and it the best sounding setup I could have ever hoped for it is truly I life like sound full all around high quality sound and they just look amazing I have yet to put the covers on cause they have such a great look and build qualit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used the Polk mounting brackets on a new build and they worked perfectly with the speakers. They sound great over wide ranges in movies and music. The entire system shakes the house and upsets my wife, so they must be good.
customer_reviews.author: MNPilot

customer_reviews.title: In wall speaker for clean installations for surround sound.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used in-wall speakers such as this many times. This is an updated version of the ones I’ve used in the past. Installation is pretty straight forward as you have to cut the wall for the speaker but it fits well and the clamps hold the speaker tightly to the wall. Sound is better than the others I’ve used so this is a bonus. I would recommend this front channel speaker fir clean installations.
customer_reviews.author: James Marcoccia

customer_reviews.title: solid build
customer_reviews.text: My plans changed, so I did not need these anymore and returned them, but not before taking them out of the box and checking them out. They are very well built, and look impressive. I can only assume they sound great from the reviews I have read and personal experience with my existing Polk speakers
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: These sound AWESOME! I paired them with fronts and rears powered ...
customer_reviews.text: These sound AWESOME! I paired them withfronts andrears powered by my- great setup.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Read the return policy
customer_reviews.text: You only have 30 days to return - even if you get a defective product. You need to make sure that you immediately take items out of the box and test them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellence in sound clarity!
customer_reviews.text: Had these wall installed and to me they are as good or better than my Klipsch speakers at half the price! Buy Them!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... wall speaker in my ceiling and that was the best gamble ever
customer_reviews.text: i installed this center channel in wall speaker in my ceiling and that was the best gamble ever ,sound is amazing clear and crisp
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the money. I have had many derroun sound system this is my first inwall center speaker. Crisp and clear sound. Can't go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.author: Rod P

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing. I was running a phantom center with just ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing. I was running a phantom center with just L&R 265 RT’s. I’m very happy with having the 255C as a dedicated center. I had to run it vertically, but I’m still very happy with it. I love the discreet “vanishing” grill. Others have mentioned rattles from the grill magnets, but I have not experienced that at all with a Bic F12 running just below the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clear crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent center speaker. Had to install vertically due to studs, but works fantastic. Top of line.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This in wall center speaker is awesome. excellent quality sound as I have come to expect from Polk over the years. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: wd lash

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker!
customer_reviews.text: My home theatre installer advised against mounting this in the ceiling, which was my plan all along. I insisted, he complied, and it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Hookdriver47

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have had B&W speakers that cost 5 times more, but only sounded a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Farzin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Installed this speaker as a center speaker underneath my wall mounted 65" tv and it looks and sound great. What a nice improvement from my JVC center chanel standard speaker that looked ugly compared to an in-wall speaker. Installation was a breeze, sound is awesome, wife is happy my old college speakers are gone and the basement looks professional. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Arrison IV

customer_reviews.title: Immaculate sound!
customer_reviews.text: Polk Audio does not disappoint. These sound amazing for in wall speakers. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this center channel
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome and really handles the audio from both movies and music very well.
customer_reviews.author: Aric White

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more pleased by the quality and amazing sound I am getting from this speaker. After lots of research and not wanting to spend a fortune I settled on this and literally could not be happier. Friends and family are blown away at how good this sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jasa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this with the matching surrounds and stereo speakers. These are easy to install (unless you hit a stud) and they sound great. Careful when you paint though. The first sprayer I got blew gunk and it was irritating and didnt leave it smooth. I may order a new cover and respray with a sprayer I later bought for the others.
customer_reviews.author: PeterD

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Attractive low profile design. But sound is the real star here. I'm using this center channel in my great room with 14 feet speaker and nothing is lost when watching movies which was my concern. This unit delivers crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: NateO

customer_reviews.title: Great performance at an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and sounds great. Perfect addition to our home theater setup.
customer_reviews.author: BigHarleyDude

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price! Will never use TV volume from TV speakers again! Was using small Yamaha front channel but, this is awesome. and you can turn off the tweeter too since the front panel is attached magnetically. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Turned my movie room into a cathedral of sound
customer_reviews.text: It is workth the money to set up the right system. I have been slowly putting a movie room together and finally got the center channel speaker and it is an amazing sounding speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Slade Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Used this speaker as my center channel in my theater. Great sound quality and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality! Really amazing, Polk really doing an amazing job on this one. I mean who puts out quality products for very reasonable prices anymore. Thanks Polk

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Product has a really good sound to it and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: damien givens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great contribution to my system. have all Polk speakers now in 5.1 setting.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have the side speakers so this made a great addition to my inwall set.
customer_reviews.author: Leo B

customer_reviews.title: polk is good
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on this one for my system. Glad i did, best speaker in my set. I was afraid that my system was gonna be all sound and no voices, this one solved my insecurity issues with that.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, works great....performs on par with much more expensive pieces as a center channel.
customer_reviews.author: J to the Izzo

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I wasn't sure if the Polk sound would please me. Let me reassure you that not only am I pleased but really satisfied with my new in-wall surround sound. It's really like sitting in the movie theater with a bag of popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Harris

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing. Painting not super easy because I didn't want ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing. Painting not super easy because I didn't want to clog up the scrim. Prep was a little challenging but the sound quality is great. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Greenland

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and worth the money.  Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful speakers for the in ceiling application in my home. They are crisp, clear and fabulous. They are worth the money and all good!
customer_reviews.author: Monica D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good center speakers but felt like I should have gone up one level for my home theatre
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeev

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good look.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers rock and are easy to install. Final finish looks real clean. Running them with an Onkyo TX-NR626 I bought on Amazon for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: abqishome

customer_reviews.title: Great center channel!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this into the side of our tray ceiling as a center channel. Because you can aim the tweeter - it works perfectly and sounds amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best price on Amazon and the sound quality is great! Easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: They sound great in a big room
customer_reviews.text: Installed these into our executive conference room. They sound great in a big room.
customer_reviews.author: DaVe_R

customer_reviews.title: Great center channel
customer_reviews.text: Working great and I love having it set into the wall. It's perfect. It has great clarity and the voices are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. The grill fits over the top unlike the speakers from their less expensive series which fit inside...so I need to RE do my enclosure.....but they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: PopsLFC

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This was a breeze to install. Polk provides a template and easy to follow instructions. Sounds great and is a nice addition to any home theater system.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for the price. Well worth the money and sounds on par with most of the higher end speakers.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for home theater.
customer_reviews.text: works beautifully and even has a grill that can be painted to match the walls so you barely know it is even there.

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on getting a refund, in case of return
customer_reviews.text: I returned this speaker unopened and was advise the speaker wasn't in the box = no refund. Theft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great center channel if your looking for a stealth look
customer_reviews.text: This is a great center channel if your looking for a stealth look. I put this in my new basement and paired it with the 265RT as left and right. I have the PSW505 12 inch sub and 90 RT in ceiling as rears. Watching movies literally sounds like we're in a movie theater. The wife was very impressed with what I chose to put in our new basement and how great it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G Weber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: What can i say? Its Polk. Works great, sounds great. Let it bake in for a few days.

customer_reviews.text: I love Polk. I have two of these for my center speakers and they sound great.

customer_reviews.text: Granteed you will realize the quality of crisp highs. Powerful bass. You will not regret this investment.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent center channel speaker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in wall center channel speaker. Sounds crisp and clear which is critical for a center channel. Polk 255c-rt brings it home!!

customer_reviews.title: New home new surround sound system
customer_reviews.text: Great sound center with excellent clarity. Combined with 4 RC80i speakers and a Velodyne subwoofer, we are very happy with this system.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The speaker works well but the mesh cover does not fit. Update: I called customer service and issue was resolved right away!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this center channel to be installed below our 70" TV so it would be a complete system with the speakers in the ceiling. I installed it in the wall so the face plate is the only thing you see. The sould is even better than I had hoped for. Low tones sound great the the higher tones sound great also...very clear speach also. I would recommend this to anyone!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Sound great. Nothing special, but give a good sound.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Speaker For The Price
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic center channel for the price. Mine is mounted in the ceiling and it sounds great. The speaker is easy install and should work with any commercially available receiver. If this review was helpful to you, please click the "yes" button below - it helps Amazon (and those of us who write reviews) know if the information provided is of value to others.

customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze. The hardest part is getting the cables through the walls. Sound is crisp and clear.

customer_reviews.text: It sounds great! It is definitely worth the money. I had another center speaker and I am glad that I upgraded.

customer_reviews.text: Speaker looks great and sounds even better. I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend this to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: These in wall center speakers are great for what I need them for
customer_reviews.text: These in wall center speakers are great for what I need them for. They work well with my home entertainment system. I have a few matching speakers for surround sounds. I would say these are for amateur systems. They don't have a high end price tag but sounds pretty good. I have a older set where the cover has to snap in and is a pain to get on and off. These have magnetic covers that look really nice and is super easy to get on and off.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: so far so good . easily mounts into wall...sounds good i added these to my surround sound system in my house.

customer_reviews.text: I wasnt too sure if the quality was worth the price, but I am happy I got this center channel. Makes a great in the wall home theater.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for cost & performance!

customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sounds great. It's 'in-wall', so if you're walls are extra cheap, the sound will be too, but with reasonably constructed walls and thoughtful build/install of the speaker, they sound great when paired with a good quality amp.

customer_reviews.title: Only had it for a few days - nice quality as I would expect from this manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a few days - nice quality as I would expect from this manufacturer. The grill is magnetically held in place. Doesn't seem to be an elegant design though I like it more than the standard pressure fit.

customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality in-wall speaker with a good price, these fit the bill! We now have a cleaner look in our family room without compromising the sound. Room size: 19' x 16' x 10' tall ceilings. My set-up: Polk Audio: 2 Front Surrounds 265RT, 1 Center Channel 255C-RT, 2 Rear Surrounds 65RT, BIC America F12 Subwoofer. Onkyo TX-NR636. We listen to music & watch movies, both are great!

customer_reviews.title: worked great! Sound is a 10 out of
customer_reviews.text: I installed in my 2x6 wall, worked great! Sound is a 10 out of 10

customer_reviews.title: I just finished my basement and wanted a good quality center speaker without going too crazy on budget
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my basement and wanted a good quality center speaker without going too crazy on budget. This met the mail. It sounds great for the price and other gear I connected it to. I would definitely recommend it as a good mid-tier speaker. Audiophiles will expect more.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this off Amazon and it was the perfect fit to top off my 5.1 channel in-ceiling speaker install in the living room. Due to pipes and exterior walls, I put all of the speakers in the ceiling. It looks great and sounds amazing. I was worried about putting the center channel up there, but this speaker has compensated well and I have no complaints at all. The fit between studs is great and it is well supported with 5/8" drywall.

product_meta.title: Polk Audio 255c-RT In-Wall Center Channel Speaker (2) 5.25" Drivers - The Vanishing Series | Easily Fits into the Wall | Power Port | Paintable Grille
product_meta.description: Style:SingleThe Vanishing Series 255c-RT is the centerpiece of a world-class stealth home theater. Paintable to match any decor, this in-wall center channel speaker blends in perfectly with its surroundings. Anchoring all the action without attracting attention, the 255c-RT ensures all you see is screen, and all you hear is dynamic, crystal clear sound. Patented bass venting design smoothly transitions air flow, eliminating turbulence and distortion, for deeper, more efficient bass impact. The unique, wafer-thin grille is magnetically secured to deliver nearly transparent, ultra-small perfs and dynamic, unimpeded sound. Perfect Fit templates, a precision flange, available pre-construction brackets and the patented Rotating Cam system ensure secure, vibration-free installation. (Cutout: 13-1/8" W x 7-5/8" H, Mounting depth: 3-3/8")
